üè∞ 1. The Wizard's Commitment

Welcome, Seeker of Cosmic Wisdom! At Quantum Merlin, we believe that your personal data is as sacred as the ancient scrolls themselves. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, protect, and honor the information you entrust to us on your mystical journey.

Our Core Promise: Your birth data and personal readings never leave your device. We have no access to your individual cosmic calculations‚Äîthey belong to you alone.

üìú 2. Information We Collect

2.1 Information You Provide

  • Birth Data: Date, time, and location of birth for numerology calculations
  • Names: For numerology analysis and sigil generation
  • Questions: Topics you explore within our mystical tools

Important: All this data is stored locally in your browser's localStorage and never transmitted to our servers.

2.2 Automatically Collected Data

  • Analytics: Anonymous usage patterns via Google Analytics
  • Device Info: Browser type, screen size, general location
  • Ad Data: Interaction with advertisements through Google AdSense

üõ°Ô∏è 3. How We Protect Your Data

Like the protective wards around Merlin's tower, we employ multiple layers of security:

  • Local Storage: Personal data never leaves your device
  • No Accounts: No passwords to hack, no databases to breach
  • Encrypted Connections: All site traffic uses HTTPS encryption
  • Minimal Collection: We only gather what's necessary

üç™ 4. Cookies & Tracking

Essential Cookies

Required for the site to function properly, including remembering your preferences and progress.

Analytics Cookies

Google Analytics helps us understand how seekers use our tools. This data is anonymized and aggregated.

Advertising Cookies

Google AdSense uses cookies to display relevant advertisements. You can opt out through Google's Ad Settings.

Your Choice: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, though some features may not work as intended.

ü§ù 5. Third-Party Services

  • Google Analytics: Usage patterns (Privacy Policy)
  • Google AdSense: Advertisements (Ad Policy)
  • Cloudflare: Security & performance (Privacy Policy)

‚ö° 6. Your Sacred Rights

  • Access: View all data stored in your browser's localStorage
  • Delete: Clear your data with one click in our settings
  • Export: Download your readings and calculations
  • Opt-Out: Disable analytics and personalized ads
  • Portability: Your data is in standard formats

üë∂ 7. Children's Privacy

Quantum Merlin is designed for users aged 13 and older. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe a child has provided us with personal data, please contact us immediately.

üîÑ 8. Policy Updates

As the cosmic energies shift, so too may this policy. We will notify you of significant changes through:

  • Updated "Last Modified" date at the top of this page
  • Prominent notice on our homepage for major changes

üì¨ Questions About Your Privacy?
